隖字的基本解释

隖
wù
同“坞”。

隖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》安古切，上姥，影。］
［《集韻》烏故切，去莫，影。］
“塢1”的古字。
(1)土堡，小城堡。
(2)四边高中央低的地方。

隖字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隖； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1358第20
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】安古切【集韻】於五切，?音鄔。【說文】小障也。【唐韻】村隖也。與塢同。　又【說文】一曰庳城。【廣韻】壁壘也。【後漢·董卓傳】卓築萬歲隖，積金穀，爲三十年儲。　又【集韻】烏故切，音惡。障也。　或作䃖埡。

隖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

隖字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
隖
wù

隖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" Anguqie, grandma, shadow. ]
["Ji Yun" Wu Gu cut, go to Mo, shadow. ]
An ancient word for "wu 1".
(1) Tubao, a small castle.
(2) A place where the four sides are high and the center is low.
隖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　隖; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1358 No. 20
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Anguqi [Jiyun] in Wuqie,? Yinwu. [Said the text] Xiaozhang also. 【Tang Yun】Cun Yan also. Same as the dock.　[Said Wen] One said Yucheng. [Guang Yun] Barriers too. [Later Han·Dong Zhuo Chuan] Long live Zhuo Zhu, the accumulation of gold, for thirty years.　[Jiyun] Wu Gu Qiqi, the sound is evil. Barrier also.　Or as Denya.
